THE LEGAL POWERS AND DUTIES
POLICE OFFICERS^*
OF THE CITY OF NEW ORLEANS.
ARTICLE VII.
JURISDICTION.
Sec. 1. The Police Officers of the City of New
Orleans are authorized to take cognizance of all
criminal offences, and violations of Ordinances,
committed within the following boundaries : Commencing at the Upper Line of the Fourth District,
known as the late City of Lafayette, and extending thence to the Lower Boundary of the Third
District, on the line known as the " Canal des
Pecheurs," and all the territory between that
